ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: You get exposure to two different fields of science, one of which you are much less familiar with. I'd recommend it if you are okay with accepting that you will get very little done in lab and it will be high stress for those 6 weeks.

-Provides exposure to 2 research labs. -1 Experimental & 1 theoretical, thus allows students to step out of their comfort zone, regardless of their background. -3 weeks per lab, which is not enough time to do much in depth
yes it was good to be exposed to different types of science
It's a much bigger time investment than most classes, especially if your modules are experimental. Good for anyone who wants to get into bio research.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It gave me experimental lab experience, which may prove to be useful to draw on when thinking about theoretical problems in my research.
